column4: how can I disable firestarter/the firewall? I have it set to not load on boot but I always have to sudo /etc/init.d/firestarter stop   to get my internet working...
for one, you could remove it.
or just name the init.d/firestarter to _firestarter or something else.
it actually looks like iptables is a standard package.. it wants to remove ubuntu-standard
